sentences.en: As Faldo's final putt rattled in, he qualified to join a select band of illustrious sportsmen.
sentences.cn: 随着福尔多的最后一杆轻击，球应声入洞，他得以跻身门槛颇高的顶级运动员之列。

sentences.en: Because he left the illustrious achievement in one's post of people satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 人们缘何为他哭泣、如此怀念他?因为他留下了人民满意的赫赫政绩.

sentences.en: Behind the presumptuous General loomed the illustrious Marshal Petain.
sentences.cn: 在这位跋扈的将军背后隐然可见很有名气的贝当元帅的身影.

sentences.en: Boxing ranks among the Olympic Games'most illustrious orts.
sentences.cn: 拳击比赛是奥运会中最杰出的运动项目.

sentences.en: Dido received the illustrious exiles with friendliness and hospitality.
sentences.cn: 狄多友好而殷勤地接待这些著名的漂泊者.

sentences.en: Don't pull your illustrious past on me.
sentences.cn: 别把你那辉煌的过去灌输给我啦.

sentences.en: He enjoyed a long and illustrious career as a radio producer.
sentences.cn: 他作为电台节目制作人的生涯漫长而辉煌.

sentences.en: Hung - chien said, " Mr. Tung does indeed come from an illustrious family!
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 道: “ 董先生不愧系出名门!

sentences.en: No , he would be a soldier, and return after long years , all war - worn and illustrious.
sentences.cn: 得了, 他更愿意当一名士兵, 待到伤痕累累,名噪天下时再返归故里.

sentences.en: She has had an illustrious career.
sentences.cn: 她已经有了辉煌的事业。

sentences.en: The aged and illustrious man had done what the poor boy had refused to do.
sentences.cn: 这位年迈的、显赫的人物此刻做了这个穷孩子不肯做的事.

sentences.en: The composer was one of many illustrious visitors to the town.
sentences.cn: 那位作曲家是许多造访过这个城市的杰出人物之一。

sentences.en: The illustrious Cuvier did not perceive that a barnacle was a crustacean.
sentences.cn: 大名鼎鼎的居维叶也未看出藤壶是一种甲壳动物.

sentences.en: There was , he said, in days of yore , an illustrious priestess of St. Ewold.
sentences.cn: 他说, 从前, 圣埃沃尔德有一位著明的女祭司.

sentences.en: These guys were the illustrious guardians of the Ford Motor Company.
sentences.cn: 这些董事们是福特汽车公司声名显赫的保护人.

sentences.en: They were jubilant with vanity over their new grandeur and the illustrious trouble they were making.
sentences.cn: 他们想到自己新得的荣耀,想到给镇里人惹的响当当的麻烦,感到心满意足高兴极了.

sentences.en: Wagner was just one of many illustrious visitors to the town.
sentences.cn: 瓦格纳只是到访过这座小镇的众多名人中的一位。

trans.tran_cn: 著名的，杰出的，卓越的，辉煌的，显赫
trans.tran_en: famous and admired because of what you have achieved
